briefdescription.para: Compile time constant representing what kind of schema this class is.
Construct a PhysxSchemaPhysxCharacterControllerAPI on UsdPrim prim .

detaileddescription.para: Equivalent to PhysxSchemaPhysxCharacterControllerAPI::Get(prim.GetStage(), prim.GetPath()) for a valid prim, but will not immediately throw an error for an invalid prim

briefdescription.para: Construct a PhysxSchemaPhysxCharacterControllerAPI on the prim held by schemaObj .

detaileddescription.para: Should be preferred over PhysxSchemaPhysxCharacterControllerAPI(schemaObj.GetPrim()), as it preserves SchemaBase state.

briefdescription.para: Destructor.
Up axis for stepping functionality.
See GetPhysxCharacterControllerUpAxisAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: The non-walkable mode controls if a character controller slides or not on a non-walkable part.
See GetPhysxCharacterControllerNonWalkableModeAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: The climbing mode.
See GetPhysxCharacterControllerClimbingModeAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Height of invisible walls created around non-walkable triangles.

detaileddescription.para: Allowed range [0, max_float).

briefdescription.para: See GetPhysxCharacterControllerInvisibleWallHeightAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Maximum height a jumping character can reach.

detaileddescription.para: Allowed range [0, max_float).

briefdescription.para: See GetPhysxCharacterControllerMaxJumpHeightAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: The contact offset used by the controller.

detaileddescription.para: Allowed range [0, max_float).

briefdescription.para: See GetPhysxCharacterControllerContactOffsetAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Defines the maximum height of an obstacle which the character can climb.

detaileddescription.para: Allowed range [0, max_float).

briefdescription.para: See GetPhysxCharacterControllerStepOffsetAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Scale coefficient for underlying kinematic actor.

detaileddescription.para: Allowed range [0, max_float).

briefdescription.para: See GetPhysxCharacterControllerScaleCoeffAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Cached volume growth.

detaileddescription.para: Allowed range [0, max_float).

briefdescription.para: See GetPhysxCharacterControllerVolumeGrowthAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Return a vector of names of all pre-declared attributes for this schema class and all its ancestor classes.

detaileddescription.para: Does not include attributes that may be authored by custom/extended methods of the schemas involved.

briefdescription.para: Return a PhysxSchemaPhysxCharacterControllerAPI holding the prim adhering to this schema at path on stage.

detaileddescription.para: If no prim exists at path on stage, or if the prim at that path does not adhere to this schema, return an invalid schema object. This is shorthand for the following:

briefdescription.para: Applies this single-apply API schema to the given prim.

detaileddescription.para: This information is stored by adding "PhysxCharacterControllerAPI" to the token-valued, listOp metadata apiSchemas on the prim.

simplesect.para: A valid PhysxSchemaPhysxCharacterControllerAPI object is returned upon success. An invalid (or empty) PhysxSchemaPhysxCharacterControllerAPI object is returned upon failure. See UsdPrim::ApplyAPI() for conditions resulting in failure.

briefdescription.para: Returns the type of schema this class belongs to.
PhysX CCT extended parameters.

detaileddescription.para: For any described attribute Fallback Value or Allowed Values below that are text/tokens, the actual token is published and defined in PhysxSchemaTokens. So to set an attribute to the value "rightHanded", use PhysxSchemaTokens->rightHanded as the value.
